website_summaries.verdict: The nice thing about this 15-seat Hatchimal CollEGGtible secret scene is that the Hatchimals can stay inside the egg for storage after play is done.
pros: The surprise is that you do not know which scene you get until you open the toy
cons: You will have to buy others separately

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Live Up to the Hype for my Kiddo
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was upset that the playset does not store any Hatchimals- it won’t close if any of them are inside. Cute toy- but I was expecting a little more. For those ordering - the amazon exclusive packaging is just the bare minimum sized box with no windows to see through to the product- packaging was just minimized for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Fun but doesn't hold interest very long
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was excited to received a new Hatchimals playset a few months ago. It comes with one "pre-hatched" hatchimal.. Daughter enjoys opening and closing it. There is a scene to view through a little peephole at the top that was fun to see the first time but doesn't really hold any interest. Seems a little pricey given the original playset had more activities and cost a few dollars more. It was more exciting to explore the first time but doesn't get too much play time.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Cooler than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This secret scene playset is soooo much cooler than I expected! When you open the little bottom door, the top of the egg spins and opens up, allowing you to open the sides. Also, you can store hatchimals in here. You just have to put them in specific places where they won't be in the way of the playset closing. Some other reviewers said they couldn't store their hatchimals in there. Anyways, great product!
customer_reviews.author: camquatch

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 of these for my 3 girls (7, ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my 3 girls (7, 8 and 10) for Easter. Was going to get different ones, but all 3 were identical. I'm not sure what I was expecting, but it wasn't what we got. 50 cent containers of Playdoh got more attention than these things from my daughters. Now my 5 yr-old son, he wanted to tear the egg apart to find out how it worked.... so there was that....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for travel. I bought it as a surprise for my daughter for our 11 hour flight. She was able to put it on the pull down table and play with it for hours. When we were done we just stuffed the figures back inside and we were good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute
customer_reviews.text: This thing first off is very cute. It folds up and down and is a really cute house type toy for hatchimals if thats what your kid is into. Almost more importantly (if you ask me) is how surprisingly durable it is. I bought it for my 5 year old, but her 1 year old brother plays with it too. Mostly by opening and closing and throwing it (let me tell you the one year old is a throwing champion). >.> it has never had any trouble, or broken in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME TOY! A TOTAL HIT!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her Hatchimals! There are three things every little girl seems to love: - toys with many pieces - small adorable animals - being able to hatch your own critter Hatchimals are pure genius. She has them next to her whether she's playing or doing her homework. She absolutely loves her Hatchimals!
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves Hatchimals, and was excited for this gift! Plays with it often, and wasn’t found in stores when I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Of course the kids love this.
customer_reviews.text: They remind me of furbies and they also freaked me out but I actually don't mind the hatchimals. It is fun to get them to cone out of their shell. I like that you can train them then reset them but the kids just play with them. I would recommend them to others for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hude

customer_reviews.title: Not very interesting inside but cool to open.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in this Hatchimal for the price. The mechanics are great for opening & closing and it’s fun, but kids lost interest quickly as it didn’t do much inside.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma K

customer_reviews.title: Great Toys!
customer_reviews.text: I know absolutely nothing about “Hatchimals” But let me tell you, I have one happy Little Grandaughter! She loved then ! Great service and fast delivery!,
customer_reviews.author: Sally L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel also! Small.
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than the in store version, but my four year old loves playing with this. She packed it recently for a flight to bring to her grandparents and played with it down there. So small enough for a suitcase and perfect for play on the go.
customer_reviews.author: ShanLando2

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I'm not up to date on toys for kids these days. Upon on delievery it was less than what I was expecting. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Duskofday

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter thinks it’s great. I’m not 5 so I think they’re kind of dumb. Guess that’s why I leave the toy reviews to Ryan??
customer_reviews.author: Doniell

customer_reviews.title: No batteries required
customer_reviews.text: I like that to pop the top you dont need batteries and just have to pull the merry-go-round out and my girls get a kick out of the secret picture that you see through the flower.
customer_reviews.author: StaryEyedKitten

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: A cute toy that I got on sale. I wouldn't have paid full price for this though. My 5 year old plays with it a little.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy H

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. My niece is going to absolutely love this!!! Heck, I love it and want to play with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Okrr

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: 6 yr old loves it, it open and closes easy enough for the 6 yr old to operate, 4 yr old brother has some trouble. Cute little storage area, 6 yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: School Charity Gift Request
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift request at a local school charity - no idea how the toy works, but was very pleased with the speed it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: MFW

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift! A bit smaller than I expected but looks like my niece will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this little play house thing. She was mad it only comes with one little hatchimal, but other than that it was a big hit!

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my little she loves it! Perfect for my 7 year d

customer_reviews.title: Cute play set
customer_reviews.text: Cute playset for the hatchimals. My 5 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jbuechler

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love hatchimals
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, but it'd be nice if it came with more than just one hatchimal.
customer_reviews.author: Artist by Faith

customer_reviews.title: My grandaughter gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just loved this I got it for her for Easter it is great opens up easy for her to use

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and has been having a good time playing. Sticks a little when trying to open, always worried we will break it

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and it is motorized for opening the egg.

customer_reviews.title: Loved by a hatchimal fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift two months ago for a 5 year old who already had a lot of hatchemals. She loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a cute little set. I would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for younger kidsof five please because his toes are so tiny they co
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say much about this product only that for my nieces it was unbelievable . Of course I purchase several different things of Hatchimals So I guess is the toy of the year thank you

customer_reviews.title: Expensive plastic egg but daughter wanted it 😉
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my 6 yr old she love it Tnxs

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my 9 year old daughter and it has been a hit. She and her sister (2) play with it daily.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to love this.. Its exactly what she wanted

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing no need for battery and my daughter (4yo) plays with it all day!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old daughter who loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Hatchimal houses are the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a surprise hatchimal inside their house that slides down its slide when the house opens by itself.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for play time
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves this! She plays with all her mini hatchimals in it.

customer_reviews.title: I would have like it in the original box
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Just in time for Easter. Didn't know it was compact shipping. I would have like it in the original box. This was an Easter gift.

customer_reviews.title: very cute!
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this! it's pretty cool that it opens up on it's own and she likes that there are special little "seats" for each hatchimal inside.

product_meta.title: Hatchimals, Secret Scene Playset for Colleggtibles (Styles May Vary), Multicolor (6044073)
product_meta.description:
There's a magical, secret world just for Hatchimals collectibles – and you! On the outside, the secret scene playset is a beautiful egg covered in bright flowers and climbing vines. But what’s hidden inside? For a sneak peek, hold it up to the light and look through the flower to discover one of three secret scenes! What you see gives you a hint at what’s inside! Pull the flower and open the egg. There are three glittering gardens you could hatch, each with an exclusive Hatchimals collectible! Will you discover bubblegum bloom, LaLa Lavender or sunshine sparkle? With 15 places to play and display, your collectibles can ride the slide, spin on the Merry-Go-Round, perch in the nests and more! Your tiny friends can even sit pretty on the swing! Close the egg to keep the secret! You'll love hatching again and again with the glittering garden secret scene playset!

SET CONTAINS:
Includes: 1 Secret Scene Playset, 1 Hatchimals CollEGGtible, 1 Instruction Sheet
feature_bullets: Sneak a peek at what's inside the secret scene Playset! Hold the beautiful egg up to the light and look through the flower to see 1 of 3 glittering garden secret scenes! Will you find bubblegum Bloom, Lala Lavender or sunshine sparkle?
Each glittering garden secret scene comes with its own exclusive Hatchimals collectible! Who will you add to you colleggtion?
There are 15 places to play and display! Give your exclusive collectible a ride on the slide, a spin on the Merry-Go-Round or a push on the swing!
The secret scene Playset is for kids aged 5+.
Includes: 1 secret scene Playset, 1 Hatchimals collectible, 1 instruction sheet
